oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hansel and Gretel Program
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Messick High School; theater; Ellis Auditorium; education;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The program for a production of "Hansel and Gretel" at the Ellis Auditorium on March 5th and 6th, 1954. Presented by The Association for Childhood Education, Memphis Branch, the play was a production of Messick High School.
